reviews.text: This guest house run by the Ashram is by far one of the best mid range accommodations available. The view of the ocean is incredible. The rooms are simple yet comfortable. Its walking distance from all the Ashram places and so makes for a great location as well.
reviews.title: Excellent affordable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I visited pondy for the first time with my wife. I was planning to stay close to the beach and was looking for hotels close to sea. I found few hotels, but were out of my budget. Then I found a guest house list in Aurbobindo ashram website. Most of these guest houses give preference to Ashram devotees. But Sea Side guest house is the only one which offers its services to normal tourists also. I booked a sea facing double deluxe a/c room well in advance (Rs. 1275/-). I sent a cheque for the full payment 10 days earlier. The staff responded very well to my queries and booked the sea facing room.
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay with great views

reviews.text: The day we arrived the reception was hassle free and we were in our room in just 5 mins. The rooms are really clean and the bathroom too. You have A/C, 2 Fans and finally the excellent view of the pondy beach. Apart from 2 beds you have 2 chairs inside the room and a two chairs and a Tea Table in the spacious balcony. You get a small frigde, a water heater for making tea. There are totally 16 rooms facing the sea. But only the 2nd floor and above have a better view of the sea. The sea may be just 20-25 mts away from the rooms.
reviews.title: Dreamy

reviews.text: The guest house is located very close (200mts) to the Gandhi statue on pondy beach, which is the center for tourists to spend the evening. Aurobindo samadhi is just 3-4 mins walk from the guest house. The Vinayaka temple is just behind. Apart from the simple clean food provided by the guest house, you have lots of good options for both veg and non-veg food. For veggies there is Adyar's Anandha Bhavan, Hotel Karthink, Hotel Surguru.
reviews.title: enjoying the french flavour in India

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was real lucky to get a room here, that too a sea facing one...Extremely clean rooms, mind blowing view, perfect location @ very affordable rates..what more can one ask for in pondy!!! The balcony of the room will be a perfect place for sunrise or sunset with a cup of coffee in your hand..
reviews.title: LEGENDARRYYY

reviews.text: The staff was sufficiently helpful and the complementary breakfast provided at the hotel was awesome..The folks staying there are mostly families going to the ashram..So this would not be an ideal place with spouse/partner...And TV is not available in the room..
reviews.title: Excellent....

reviews.text: We stayed at the Sea Side Guest House in Jan2011, with small children. It has a great location; being right on the waterfront. The room was very clean and comfortable with a small balcony overlooking the ocean. The bathroom was small but adequate. A clothes line is attached in the bathroom. Stayed in 104, ground floor, sea facing. Opt for a higher floor as passer bys can see inside the room and they always do since the guest house facade is rather appealing.
reviews.title: Great location and value for money....

reviews.text: There is no television and we didn't miss it. There is provision for a kettle (tea/coffee/biscuit) in the room. Breakfast was included with a choice between Indian and Continental and is served in the dining area. Although, you have to let them know the night before of your preference. It was filling and good; not excellent. Also, they did provide milk for the children in the room. But the restaurant is not 24/7; fixed meal hours.
reviews.title: Great view, good food, kind staff!

reviews.text: Parking is in the lane behind the guest house at your own risk. Also, there is no beach but a rock-face water-front. There is Chunnambar Water sports facility about 30min outside town. We paid for a boat ride across the river to a beach there but soon enough took a refund since they didn't have any life jackets for children and were not even ready to hand over the ones for adult, and the boat was all packed. Needless to say it wasn't being run per guidelines but we didn't want to take a chance with our lives !!!
reviews.title: Really Good hotel very good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is good value for money. The basic cleanliness is good. Two things that need urgent improvement:
reviews.title: How the stay at Sea side Guest House can e more comfortable

reviews.text: 1. Ventilation at the abnormally small bathroom needs improvement. There is no exhaust, and it is so small that water spills over from the shower area and it never dries during the day. A wet bathroom cannot be a clean one. It needs at least an exhaust and a door mat outside the bathroom. It would have rated 'very good', but this feature alone reduced my rating.
reviews.title: excellent place to stay in ponducherry

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. It has a set of strange rules - such as even though the breakfast is complimentary, it has to be ordered the night before. We appreciate that they are trying to minimize wastage. But these rules are written in small typing in a Notice somewhere pinned up 9in the rooms. It would be so much more convenient if the guests are verbally informed of them during check-in, in addition to putting up notices.
reviews.title: Beautiful, spotless, amazing location

reviews.text: this is the best property in ponducherry.it is located right on beach.the rooms are spotlessly clean. the place has aroma of pace and meditative atmosphere.the breakfast is part of meal.
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Puducherry

reviews.text: the breakfast is specified veg/non-veg at the time of booking and is specific.the cost of AC rooms is much less than other properties of such location.smoking and drinking is not allowed but for such people just walk out of the gate ,cross the road - you are on beach to do what you like.rooms do not have TV - you won,t miss it ,as your balcony sea view will take all your time.
reviews.title: Serenity,beauty and affordability.

reviews.text: We stayed there two nights. The place was clean and had nice view. Food was simple and very indian. As we are in Pondicherry, we wanted to eat western food. Even our breakfast was included, we did not want to eat there at all. Maybe the food is good for indian people, but not for foreigners.
reviews.title: Not great staff

reviews.text: My friend was sick and could hardly stand. However, the receptionists were not nice. They are grumpy and not helpful. My friend had a very bad stomach ache when we arrived. Instead of being nice, they told us that she can not go to the room until we finish all the registration which we found very unkind.
reviews.title: Loved Seaside!

reviews.text: I am sure there are many other nicer hotel than this hotel in Pondicherry.
reviews.title: Worst Service- Avoid Seaside

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect place to stay in Pondy! Right on the promenade with fabulous views and easy walking distance to anywhere you want to go around town. Rooms were very clean, staff friendly, efficient and helpful and you just can't beat the price! It is run by the ashram so they have their rules but they're fair enough and makes for a quiet, peaceful atmosphere. Even though they officially only open their doors at 6 am, when we arrived at 4:30 am by overnight bus from Kodaikanal, we were SO grateful when they let us in at that early hour! We had booked the room for the night before so we wouldn't have to wait until 2 pm to check in, but we didn't anticipate the lovely welcome they gave us at that hour of the morning. Definitely worth the extra cost to stay in a sea facing room. Will stay here again!
reviews.title: Prime location facing the sea, friendly staff, great Indian food at unbelievably low prices

reviews.text: I happened to book this hotel for my brothers who come to Chennai every year to stay in this hotel. This year also I booked for him over phone. When wanted to check in , the useless persons in the reception asked for passport copies of my brothers family. Fortunately, I was in Chennai at my home at that time to scan and send images of passports of all the three members and sent to the mail ID they had given to me (info@seaside.aerosociety.org) . Also I had CCed the mail to my brother. I waited patiently to check if the mail got bounced. But it didn't happen. So called my brother to confirm that he could very well get a hard copy from my mail. The untrained, illiterate, uneducated, uncultured, mannerless guys refused to check mail and get the hard copies and denied to check-in. My frustrated brother, booked Jayaram hotel where a warm welcome was given with good hospitality.
reviews.title: Refreshing experience
